scripts.electron:dev: concurrently -k "vite" "wait-on http-get://localhost:5174 && npm run electron:compile && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --publish never
scripts.electron:build:win: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win --publish never
scripts.electron:build:mac: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac --publish never
scripts.electron:build:all: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win --mac --publish never
scripts.electron:publish:win: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win --publish always
scripts.electron:publish:mac: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac --publish always
scripts.electron:publish:all: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win --mac --publish always
scripts.electron:pack: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --dir
